original_title: Sri Lankan Rupee continues to appreciate against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee further appreciated against the US Dollar today (17 May), the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) reported.
Accordingly, the buying rate was declared at Rs. 302.42, while the selling rate stands at Rs. 316.18.
Meanwhile, CBSL reported the Middle Rate of the USD.LKR SPOT exchange rate as Rs. 310.404.
